Description: Sherd of foot of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix with convex edge, probably type A; broad stem and relatively broad resting surface; glazed black on top and underside; reserved: outer face of foot and resting surface; incised ligature on reserved standing surface.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 513)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1478)
